SELECT h.ID_PLATNIKA, h.ID_DOKUMENTU_HANDLOWEGO, h.NUMER , th.SYGNATURA,th.NAZWA,th.SUMOWANIE,h.ID_TYPU , FORMAT(cast(h.DATA_WYSTAWIENIA - 36163 as datetime),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DATA_WYSTAWIENIA , h.FORMA_PLATNOSCI ,FORMAT(cast(h.TERMIN_PLAT - 36163 as datetime),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS TERMIN_PLAT , h.UWAGI , h.WARTOSC_NETTO, h.WARTOSC_BRUTTO ,h.WARTOSC_BRUTTO_WAL,h.SYM_WAL,h.PRZELICZNIK_WAL FROM DOKUMENT_HANDLOWY AS h INNER JOIN KONTRAHENT AS k ON h.ID_PLATNIKA = k.ID_KONTRAHENTA INNER JOIN TYP_DOKUMENTU_HANDLOWEGO AS th ON h.ID_TYPU = th.ID_TYPU WHERE h.ID_TYPU IN (1,6,10,13) AND h.ID_DOKUMENTU_HANDLOWEGO = {0};

SELECT h.ID_PLATNIKA, h.PLATNIK_NAZWA, k.NIP , k.ADRES_EMAIL,k.TELEFON_FIRMOWY,k.ADRES_WWW , k.KOD_POCZTOWY, k.MIEJSCOWOSC, k.ULICA_LOKAL FROM DOKUMENT_HANDLOWY AS h INNER JOIN KONTRAHENT AS k ON h.ID_PLATNIKA = k.ID_KONTRAHENTA INNER JOIN TYP_DOKUMENTU_HANDLOWEGO AS th ON h.ID_TYPU = th.ID_TYPU WHERE h.ID_TYPU IN (1,6,10,13) AND h.ID_DOKUMENTU_HANDLOWEGO = {0};

SELECT h.NUMER , aa.INDEKS_KATALOGOWY , aa.NAZWA , pm.ILOSC , pm.CENA_BRUTTO , pm.CENA_NETTO FROM POZYCJA_DOKUMENTU_MAGAZYNOWEGO AS pm INNER JOIN ARTYKUL AS aa ON aa.ID_ARTYKULU = pm.ID_ARTYKULU INNER JOIN DOKUMENT_MAGAZYNOWY AS h ON h.ID_DOK_MAGAZYNOWEGO = pm.ID_DOK_MAGAZYNOWEGO WHERE pm.ID_DOK_HANDLOWEGO = {0} ;
INSERT INTO wapro_doc (file_name, file_data, id_plat,id_doc_handl) VALUES ('{0}','{1}',{2},{3});
SELECT w.* FROM wapro_doc AS w WHERE w.id > {0} ORDER BY w.id ASC;
SELECT w.* FROM wapro_doc AS w ;
SELECT s.INDEKS_KATALOGOWY AS art, CAST(CAST( s.STAN AS VARCHAR) AS FLOAT) as rest FROM ARTYKUL AS s WHERE s.ID_MAGAZYNU = 1;
LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '{0}' INTO TABLE {1} FIELDS TERMINATED BY ';' LINES TERMINATED BY '\r\n' IGNORE 1 LINES (art, rest);
UPDATE cataloginventory_stock_item AS i, cataloginventory_stock_status AS s SET i.qty = 0, s.qty = 0;
